europeana:record.dc:title: Results of the Rumphius Biohistorical Expedition to Ambon (1990) : Part 3. The Alcyoniidae (Octocorallia: Alcyonacea)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Ofwegen, van L.P.
Vennam J.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Octocorallia; Alcyonacea; Alcyoniidae; new species; new records; Ambon; Indonesia
europeana:record.dc:description: New records of Alcyoniidae for Ambon are given and one new species, Sinularia slieringsi, is described and figured. Specimens of S. capitalis (Pratt, 1903), S. flexibilis (Quoy & Gaimard, 1833), S. hirta (Pratt, 1903), S. muralis May, 1899, and S. procera Verseveldt, 1977, are discussed.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Results of the Rumphius Biohistorical Expedition to Ambon (1990) : Part 3. The Alcyoniidae (Octocorallia: Alcyonacea) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 68) (Issue 14)
